body: This is a hidden gem, consuming this feels like a waste cause once you finished it, you know there wont to be anything as good as this... This doujin is something that I've always wanted but never wished for... plus there's a part 2... Godly art style, plot, and story. and still on going. I'm a proper person but this made me ejaculate every 20 pages. I'm a manga artist so I know that one page takes 3+ days to finish... I made this account just to comment, this is my 1st account btw
Anyone know where se can fundo chapter 41?
